tool_description: Evaluates and rates wood species based on sustainability factors including forest certification, growth rates, and environmental impact.

species_list.description: List of wood species to evaluate for sustainability

certification_preference.description: Preferred certification standard (FSC, SFI, PEFC, any)

error_messages: Too many species: Limit evaluation to 15 species maximum
Unknown species: One or more species not found in sustainability database
Invalid certification preference: Use one of [FSC, SFI, PEFC, any]
Invalid origin weighting: Must be between 0 and 100 percent
usage: Provide a list of wood species to evaluate. Optionally specify certification preferences and how much to weight local sourcing in the sustainability score.

sustainability_scores.description: Overall sustainability scores (0-100) for each species

growth_rates.description: Tree growth rate categories (fast, moderate, slow) for each species

conservation_status.description: Conservation status (abundant, stable, declining, threatened) for each species
